ccproblem.name: prob_5_2
ccproblem.description:
Write a program that reads an integer (which you may assume will be positive) and prints a single line of the form 

5...4...3...2...1...blast off!

where the countdown starts at the integer read, and continues down to 1. For example, the output above should be printed if the input integer is 5.

Hint: make sure that each number printed is followed by exactly three period (".") characters, and that blast off! is printed at the end of the line. Aside from the space between "blast" and "off", the line should not contain any spaces.

If the program produces more than 20 lines of output, it will terminate and the test will fail.
